name: Masonry Hammer
description: The masonry hammerâ€™s head is also two-sided, like the claw hammer, but one side has a square face on it, made for pounding in nails.

name: Trowel
description: A trowel is a small pie-shaped tool that is attached to a small handle. It is used to pick up mortar and spread it onto the brick you are about to put in place.

name: Masonry Saws
description: The masonry hand saw looks a lot like a standard hand saw, but it has longer blades and larger teeth. The blade on this saw is only six to seven inches tall..

name: Power Saw
description: The power saw is a hand saw with a power cord. It is used to cut wood, metal, and other materials. It is also used to cut stone and other hard materials.

name: Straight Edges
description: Straight edges are used to make the edges of a building look straight. They are used to make the edges of a building look straight.

name: Mixing Tools
description: Mixing tools are used to mix cement, sand, and other materials. They are used to mix cement, sand, and other materials.

name: Tape Measure
description: Tape measure is used to measure the length of a building. It is used to measure the length of a building.
